        <message>Use the following script to send email dynamically
```javascript
var mail = new GlideEmailOutbound();
mail.setSubject('Hello darkness, my old friend');
mail.addRecipient('sn@sn.com');
mail.addAddress('cc', 'abc@abc.com');
mail.setBody("I've come to talk with you again");
mail.save();
```

This does not support attachment - https://support.servicenow.com/kb?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0789188
Documentation: https://developer.servicenow.com/dev.do#!/reference/api/quebec/server/r_ScopedGlideEmailOutbound-getSubject</message>
